resources.string:
In this application you are presented with a person in need of CPR
There are different steps which you have to complete in the right order to save his life

Think of the phone as a human being where you can speak or blow into the microphone, shake the device, or
touch the character on the display.

If you are uncertain what to do, every step has a HELP section in the top right corner which guides you in the right direction.
